_description: A Paraphrase of the Ten Commandments — four 8-line stanzas

BlCottCalAII.First Lines:
The ferst yntroyte of sapyensys to drede god yn euery
                    operacyon…
BlCottCalAII.Last Lines:
…Whan we ben meued to don a mysseTo be Restreyned a yen be his
                    Redempcion
BlCottCalAII.Note: No heading; ‘Explicit’ by scribe at end.
